facilityDetails: Single-room air conditioning for guest accommodation

question_answer.question: Is there an elevator for guests?
question_answer.answer: Yes, we have an elevator which go from basement to the top floor of the building.

question_answer.question: Do you have a room with three single beds? Is there elevator?
question_answer.answer: Our "Standard Triple Room" has 3 beds (1,2m). And yes we have elevator.

question_answer.question: Hi, do you have cooking facilities for group of 20?
question_answer.answer: Hello, we don't have a place to cook for many people

question_answer.question: Does the Double Room have air conditioning?
question_answer.answer: No, our room temperature always from 20-23 degree whole year so we don't need AC. Only the rooftop room (Deluxe Studio) have AC system because it hot up there.

question_answer.question: Do you have secure car parking available?
question_answer.answer: I'm sorry. We only have parking for motorbikes

question_answer.question:
We intend to book a superior studio for 2 of us and 2 kids, age 1 and 4.
Do you provide a portable heater or can you help us rent a portable heater for our room.
question_answer.answer: Hello, we can rent a portable heater for you or there are another option that the smaller room: Deluxe Studio with King-size bed, which have an AC system so you don't need a heater if you choose this room.

question_answer.question: do you have washing facilities or is there a laundry close by? Thank you
question_answer.answer: There is a laundry shop near by, just 5 minutes of walking. We also have washing facilities but it will more expensive.

question_answer.question: Hello, for the Quadruple room, there is a total of 4 beds, right? Since there is 2 bunk beds
question_answer.answer: As you can see in the photo of the room, the quadruple room have only 2 double beds for 4 peoples. (1,6m lower bed and 1,4m upper bed)

question_answer.question: How is the payment handled? Through Booking.com or direct to the host?
question_answer.answer: Hello, our guests will pay at the property, not through Booking.com, and not prepaid.

question_answer.question: Is there air conditioning in Superior Studio? (60 sq.metre room)
question_answer.answer: Sorry, we don't have air conditioning in Superior Studio. Only the Deluxe King Studio has an AC.
